title: libcrypto-1_1.dll isn't working
body:
Whenever I try to open league, it will say the client update has started, and when i press launch it says:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcrypto-1_1.dll is either not designed to work on windows or creating an error.

I have reinstalled the launcher many times, and it won't open.

What is libcrypto-1_1.dll? And do you fix this?

replies.body: If u want it to work go into ur riot games file and go into the lol file next open the RADS file and into projects and then open the League_client file and press on releases and go into the release with the highest number and when u do that search the file for libcrypto-1_1 copy and then go back to the fC:\Riot Games\League of Legends file and paste it there and then press replace file in destination and it should work

Uh just checking , but this may be a windows 10 issue with the latest update. The second I updated this happened to my League. And I reinstall league and after a day or two it deletes again and I have to reinstall all over taking up banthwidth.

That's a pretty good sign that the game files were corrupted somehow or just weren't properly installed to begin with. Try running a reinstall, but make sure you do that with admin rights this time and without a firewall running in the background.

Hi there, 

I've got the same problem since yesterday. I did what you commented underneath this message, but it still doesnt work for me. Can you please help me further? 

Kind regards,
Ive got the same problem too
